Introduction

Ryu Sera (also known as Sera) is a South Korean singer-songwriter. She was a member of the girl group 9MUSES but left in 2014. She is now a solo artist under her own independent agency OCTO. She made her solo debut on August 1, 2015 with the studio album "Serenade".

Mar 26, 2018-present
